articles.title: Lok Sabha Session Likely To End On Wednesday As Coronavirus Cases Rise - NDTV
articles.description: The Centre is exploring the possibility of curtailing the ongoing monsoon session of parliament by several days, sources say.
articles.content:
The government has held a discussion with the opposition on the issue (File)
New Delhi: The ongoing monsoon session of Lok Sabha will be curtailed by several days, the government decided today after… [+2403 chars]
